title: Integrated Remote-Virtual Laboratory Learning Design for Online Engineering Experiments

context.prior_knowledge: Basic engineering mathematics and programming knowledge
context.additional_context: Practitioner-focused course designed to strengthen hands-on competencies in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Learners can solve mathematical modeling problems with over 80% accuracy using IoT-based virtual laboratories
Learners can self-diagnose experimental activity results and develop improvement plans using analytical tools within the LMS
Learners can explain real-time data processing procedures while performing remote laboratory simulations in mobile environments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
